modName: Fabulous Followers - 3 Imperial Girls - NO Other Mods Reqd
summary: Adds 3 imperial girls to the game, as followers and marriable NPC's. They come with custom meshes, skin textures, eye, and hair - no other mod is required for their appearance, and they'll affect no other NPC's.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]***********************************************************
I AM NOT ACTIVELY MODDING SKYRIM AT THE MOMENT.

Anything I created is free for use and derivitive work. None of mods were complete and I apologize that some of them were never finished. If someone wants to pick up where I left off, they are welcome to use my work by either uploading their own mod or I can give them access to that mod's page.

My custom work will continue as planned.

Thanks everyone for your support and hopefully I will come back soon. But alas, I have a seasonal job and until April 15th, I don't know how much time I will have, or when I do have time, if I'll want to return to skyrim modding.
*********************************************************** [/color]
Update 1.3 is up! if you're happy with your main file as it is there's no need to update, the main file is still the same.

Update 1.3 added 4 optional files under the downloads section, one for each of the girls individually ( so you can pick and choose the one you want), and a non-essential patch, used to make the girls kill-able.

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/7PzLw.png[/img][/center]

[b] Please note you should not need any other mods for the girls to look as the do in screenshots, and it will not conflict with any body/face mods you have in place. They should look exactly as they do in the screenshots, minus the armor, which you can find a link to at the bottom of this description![/b]

This mod introduces 3 NPC's, each with their own set of body meshes and textures, in order to give them a great look without having to go through the process of installing other mods, and to prevent their appearance from affecting other NPCs. The NPCs are female Imperials, and are designed to be followers, but you can also marry them.

Thank you Hodilton for the video once again! <3
[youtube]GQcggYCuQTM[/youtube]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/dpCsV.png[/img]

[size=3][b]All Girls:[/b][/size]
[list] [*]are marked Essential[*]are Marriable [*]Auto-Level with Player [*]can be found at Dead Mans Drink in Falkreath[*]have different voices so travelling with all 3 is not confusing[/list]

[size=3][b]Gabiana Morelli:

[b]Health: [/b]240[b] Magicka: [/b]100[b] Stamina: [/b]170
[b]Class:[/b] Combat Ranger

[b]Inventory:[/b] Hide Shield, Steel Mace, Long Bow, 100 Steel Arrows
[b]Spells:[/b] Close Wounds, Fast Healing
[b]Perks:[/b] Light Foot, Muffled Movement, Unhindered, Restoration (Novice & Apprentice), Bladesman (3), Overdraw (3)

[size=3][b]Hadley Russo:

Perks: Light Foot, Muffled Movement, Unhindered, Bladesman (3), Restoration (Novice & Apprentice), Illusion (Novice & Apprentice), Destruction (Novice-Adept)

[size=3][b]Bixham Hossanni:
[/b][/size]
[b]Min Level: [/b]20 [b]Max Level:[/b] 100
[b]Health: 258 [/b] [b] Magicka: 132 [/b] [b] Stamina: [/b] 195
[b]Class:[/b] Combat Assassin

[img]http://i.imgur.com/KhsGL.png[/img]
[b]I highly reccomend using a mod manager, especially NMM, to install this mod. There will be updates, and it's a lot easier to uninstall if you have problems this way.[/b]

NMM Installation:
Go to the "Files" tab
Click "Download with Manager" button under the only file there.
After the mod is downloaded with NMM, activate it and load up your game. It shouldn't make too much difference where in your load order you put it.

Non-NMM Installation:
Go to the "Files" tab
Click "Download Manually" under the only file there
After the mod is downloaded, unzip the 'Data" folder in the archive to your Skyrim directory. There shouldn't be any overwritten files but it will ask you to merge folders. Click "yes"

[img]http://i.imgur.com/eH4Wl.png[/img]
NMM:
Deactivate and delete the mod in NMM. Simple!

Non NMM:
Deactivate "FFImperialGirls.esp" in your skyrim data options
In "Data" under your skyrim directory, delete the following files and folders:
3BretonGirls.esp
meshes/actor/character/bixham
meshes/actor/character/ffimperialshared
meshes/actor/character/gabiana
meshes/actor/character/hadley
facegendata/facegeom/FFImperialGirls.esp
textures/actor/character/bixham
textures/actor/character/ffimperialshared
textures/actor/character/gabiana
textures/actor/character/hadley

[img]http://i.imgur.com/65ZxN.png[/img]

[size=3][color=yellow][b]Special thanks to Mayatola for helping me with the normal map issue! Our followers get along great and you know you want more gorgeous girls so go grab her mod if you don't have it already: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24664/ [/b][/color][/size]

Also check under the "Permissions and Credits" button!
